game.name: DualVerse86
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 2D 복고풍 스피드런 게임. 두 개의 평행한 가상 세계를 전환하며 플로피 디스크를 수집하고, 제한 시간 내에 골인하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 2D retro speedrunner where every second counts. Switch between worlds, dodge traps, beat the clock.
